name: Mortis
description:
A wandering demon, a swordsmaster, facing your doom in the mortis caves, where the forgotten lie and the dead rise. Slash, roll and jump to explore the labyrinth, unearthing its dark mysteries and fearsome shades, with your dark powers to see you through.

A place of wandering spirits and twisting tunnels and paths, the shadows of that place shall rise to claim you eventually though, no matter how much you fight.

CONTROLS:

MoveA, DAttack
Space (Hold for the Night Cleaver, if you have it)
Jump W (Jump in the air for the Demon Wings, if you have them)
CrouchHold S, or press up to a low gap
RollShift + [A, D]
Look Around
Alt + Mouse
To Title
Esc (If on Title Screen)End Game
Esc
